name: Orbeetle
description: Its brain has grown to a gargantuan size, as has the rest of its body. This Pokémon's intellect and psychic abilities are overpowering.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
abilities.description: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe's held item.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
